### <b>Balance</b>

```{r}

# Weekend work
# % Active on the weekend
temp_plot <-
  my_sq_data %>%
  group_by(Date) %>%
  summarise(across(.cols = "Collaboration_hours",
                   .fns = ~mean(., na.rm = TRUE)),
            .groups = "drop") %>%
  mutate(
    lag0 = lag(Collaboration_hours, 0),
    lag1 = lag(Collaboration_hours, 1),
    lag2 = lag(Collaboration_hours, 2),
    lag3 = lag(Collaboration_hours, 3)
  ) %>%
  mutate(movave = select(., paste0("lag", 0:3)) %>% apply(1, function(x) mean(x))) %>%
  select(-paste0("lag", 0:3)) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c("Collaboration_hours", movave),
               names_to = "metrics",
               values_to = "value") %>%
  drop_na(value) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Date,
            y = value,
            colour = metrics)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_wpa_basic()

temp_plot
  
```
